name: QuickFire (Inferno Duck)
description:
Controls

W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys - Move

Move Mouse - Aim

Hold Left Mouse Button - Fire

Enter - Play or Replay Game

QuickFire is a simple 2D shooter game with the aim of the game being to destroy as many enemies as possible without dying to gain points. 

The common red enemies award 10 points and the rare gold enemies award 30 points.

Have fun!
